title: November the 5. 1605. The quintessence of cruelty, or, master-peice of treachery, the Popish pouder-plot, invented by hellish-malice, prevented by heavenly-mercy. / Truly related, and from the Latine of the learned, religious, and reverend Dr. Herring, translated and very much dilated. By John Vicars.
author: Herring, Francis, d. 1628.
publisher: Printed by G.M. for R. Harford at the signe of the guilt Bible in Queens-head-ally in Pater-noster-row,
